originalText.text:
I recently had the pleasure of touring these apartments with Henry, the leasing agent at The Suffolk, and I must say that my experience was nothing short of exceptional. Henry's professionalism, patience, and attention to detail truly set him apart.

From the moment we stepped into The Suffolk, we were immediately struck by the impressive design and aesthetics of the building. The attention to detail in the architecture and interior design is second to none. Henry took the time to walk us through every aspect of the property, no matter how tiny the detail, and he did so with a lighthearted and welcoming attitude that made the entire experience enjoyable.

Henry's patience was especially noteworthy. He never rushed us or pressured us into making a decision. He answered all my questions and provided us with all the information we needed to make an informed choice. His in-depth knowledge of the property and its amenities was evident, and he took the time to explain everything, ensuring that we felt comfortable.

Speaking of amenities, The Suffolk is a true gem. The building is incredibly well designed, and the amenities are simply stunning. From the modern fitness center to the rooftop lounge with breathtaking views, we were blown away by the thought and care put into every aspect of this community. Henry made sure to showcase these amenities, and his enthusiasm for the property was contagious.

originalText.text:
Overall I enjoy the building. It's well designed, the common areas are exactly as described, and the staff exceeds all expectations.
I give a lower rating so that I can send a warning that you view the actual apartment you're planning to lease, not an apartment that is similar to the one you're considering.
1. The ceiling heights differ across the floors and they may not disclose that difference.
2. There is also a "tint" (generous description of a thick coating, unevenly applied, to one window on each floor) that distorts the view from that window. I understand that this is a fire code requirement, but it should also be disclosed when viewing the apartment. When you're paying for a spectacular view, you will want to be sure it's clear.

originalText.text: I've been living here for a few months and honestly I can't say enough good things. The apartments are beautiful, the views stunning and the staff is so friendly and helpful.  Oh and the amenities are out of this world!

text.text: I've been living here for a few months and honestly I can't say enough good things. The apartments are beautiful, the views stunning and the staff is so friendly and helpful.  Oh and the amenities are out of this world!

originalText.text: The building is beautifully designed in and out. The facade comes with bricks that fits with the tenement buildings in the neighborhood. Actually, the building comes with modern tenement with micro-studio unit and have a great co-living environment. Lower East Side is entering a new era with new buildings like The Suffolk.

originalText.text: Sara has been SO incredibly helpful and lovely to work with. She spent so much time showing me all my options and answering my questions and made sure we landed on the perfect unit for me. Best leasing agent experience I've had and I can't wait to move in! Part of me wants to keep this gem hidden but 12/10 recommend!
